sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO comtnbndtdiary ( bndt_id , bndt_de , bndt_ceck_se , bndt_ceck_code , chck_sttus , frst_register_id , frst_regist_pnttm ) VALUES ( #bndtId# , #bndtDe# , #bndtCeckSe# , #bndtCeckCode# , #chckSttus# , #frstRegisterId# , SYSDATE )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE comtnbndtdiary SET bndt_id = #bndtId# , bndt_de = #bndtDe# , bndt_ceck_se = #bndtCeckSe# , bndt_ceck_code = #bndtCeckCode# , chck_sttus = #chckSttus# , last_updusr_id = #lastUpdusrId# , last_updt_pnttm = SYSDATE WHERE 1 = 1 AND bndt_id = #bndtId# AND bndt_de = #bndtDe# AND bndt_ceck_se = #bndtCeckSe# AND bndt_ceck_code = #bndtCeckCode#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM comtnbndtdiary WHERE 1 = 1 AND bndt_id = #bndtId# AND bndt_de = #bndtDe# AND bndt_ceck_se = #bndtCeckSe# AND bndt_ceck_code = #bndtCeckCode#
sqlMap.select: SELECT bndt_id , bndt_de , bndt_ceck_se , bndt_ceck_code , chck_sttus , frst_register_id , frst_regist_pnttm , last_updusr_id , last_updt_pnttm FROM COMTNBNDTDIARY WHERE bndt_id = #bndtId# AND bndt_de = #bndtDe# AND bndt_ceck_se = #bndtCeckSe# AND bndt_ceck_code = #bndtCeckCode#

SELECT A.BNDT_ID , A.BNDT_DE , A.BNDT_CECK_SE , A.BNDT_CECK_CODE , A.CHCK_STTUS , A.FRST_REGISTER_ID , A.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM , A.LAST_UPDUSR_ID , A.LAST_UPDT_PNTTM FROM ( SELECT BNDT_ID , BNDT_DE , BNDT_CECK_SE , BNDT_CECK_CODE , CHCK_STTUS , FRST_REGISTER_ID , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM , LAST_UPDUSR_ID , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM , ROWNUM FROM COMTNBNDTDIARY WHERE 1=1
BNDT_ID = #searchKeyword#
BNDT_DE LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY BNDT_ID DESC , BNDT_DE DESC , BNDT_CECK_SE DESC , BNDT_CECK_CODE DESC ) A WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN #firstIndex# AND #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM COMTNBNDTDIARY WHERE 1=1
BNDT_ID = #searchKeyword#
BNDT_DE LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
